# Draft:Kapleshwar Pandey

Bold text'''Kapleshwar Pandey
Position: प्रदेश उपाध्यक्ष (State Vice-President), Janata Dal (United), Bihar
Location: Patna, Bihar, India
About: Kapleshwar Pandey is an experienced JD(U) leader from Bihar with long involvement in state politics and party organization. As प्रदेश उपाध्यक्ष he has overseen grassroots mobilisation, district coordination, and outreach programs across multiple districts. He works on community development, youth engagement and party strategy.
Contact: (add phone / email / official party contact)
References
